::KitKat::

She ran and looked behind her.  She saw Land Mine coming after her.  
She yelled,"GO AWAY!"

She turned and tripped.  She screamed and fell.  She went falling 
down the hillside.  She hit trees, rocks, tumbling town the hill.
She came to rest at the base of the hill.  She lay there,in a mass of 
fur and metal, shaking badly and leaking from a gash in her hip from 
a jagged rock.  She mumled softly ,"I'm sorry.  I'm sorry." She shook 
and trembled while laying in a heap at the base of the hill.
